thread.title: 2nd ODI: Vintage Dhoni rescues with unbeaten 92, takes India to fighting 247/9
thread.title_full: 2nd ODI: Vintage Dhoni rescues with unbeaten 92, takes India to fighting 247/9 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 2nd ODI: Vintage Dhoni rescues with unbeaten 92, takes India to fighting 247/9
text:
*Indore: *Skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni led from the front with a defiant 92 not out to help India post 247/9 in 50 overs against South Africa during their second One-Day International (ODI) at the Holkar Cricket Stadium on Wednesday.
Walking in to bat with India in a spot of bother at 82/3 in the 18th over, Dhoni batted right ... Â»
